examples: He was densely distressed—and perhaps I should have sympathized with him if I had been able to detach my mental vision from the unsuspected sharer of my cabin as though he were my second self. There he was on the other side of the bulkhead, four or five feet from us, no more, as we sat in the saloon.

entries.meaning: (informal) A dish at a restaurant, etc. intended to be shared between several people.
examples: Can we order the seafood platter as a sharer?
